      • humanreadble

        public static java.lang.String humanreadble(long bytes,
                            int roundFactor)
        Format bytes to make them human readable.

        For example 1572864 Bytes = 1,5 MB

        Parameters:
        bytes - A value in bytes
        roundFactor - The round factory, for example 1/2 GB.
        Returns:
        The converted value (in Bytes, KB, MB or GB)
